summary: This mod replaces the appearance of the Long Bow, Hunting Bow, and Imperial Bow with the Ebony Bow, Nightingale Bow, and Dwarven Bow.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=red]BETTER LOOKING BOWS[/center][/size][/color]


[center][size=5]This mod replaces the appearance of the Long Bow, Hunting Bow, and Imperial Bow with the better looking, more powerful bows of Skyrim.[/center][/size]


[size=5][color=yellow][u]Reason for this Mod[/size][/color][/u]

[size=4]I got tired of seeing Bandits and Soldiers attacking me and each other with pathetic looking bows.  The Long bow, Hunting bow, and Imperial bow are used by almost ALL of the NPCs in the game, but lack the awesome appearance of the other available bows...in my opinion.  I mean what kind of \"Imperial Legion\" arms it\'s soldiers with something that looks like a glorified tree limb?  Now the \"most used\" bows in the game can look like the \"best\" bows in the game...[/size]



[size=5][color=yellow][u]Bows altered with this mod[/size][/color][/u]
[size=4]
The Long bow now has the Ebony bow appearance...with altered textures
The Hunting bow now has the Nightingale bow appearance...with altered textures
The Imperial bow now has the Dwarven bow appearance...with altered textures[/size]

[size=4][center][color=red]None of the damage, weight, or cost values were changed with the bows.  The stats in the screenshots reflect my personal character values.  I play as an archer and level up those skills first.  All original bow ratings will remain unchanged.[/size][/center][/color]
author: JeremeW5257
